description: Typography tokens for VibeX. Defines fonts, weights, sizes, and line heights for internal pages (Noto Sans Arabic) and landing page (IBM Plex Arabic).

internal.name: Noto Sans Arabic
internal.usage: All internal app pages including dashboard and components

landing.name: IBM Plex Arabic
landing.usage: Marketing and SaaS landing pages only

guidelines: Use Noto Sans Arabic for all internal UI and dashboards to ensure unified Arabic/English readability.
Use IBM Plex Arabic exclusively on the landing page for marketing and branding consistency.
Headings should be bold or semi-bold for hierarchy clarity.
Body text should remain regular weight for readability.
Always use defined tokens, not arbitrary font sizes or weights.
